mapper.select: select storeno, categoryno, categoryname from category where storeno = #{storeNo}
select menuno, categoryno, menuname, menudesc, menuprice, menuimg, isspecial, ischange, unitno from menu where categoryno = #{categoryNo}
select menuno, categoryno, menuname, menudesc, menuprice, menuimg, isspecial, ischange, unitno from menu where menuno = #{menuNo}
mapper.update: update menu set menuname = #{menuName}, menudesc = #{menuDesc}, menuprice = #{menuPrice}, isSpecial = #{isSpecial}, isChange = #{isChange} where menuNo = #{menuNo}
mapper.select: select u.unitno, u.unitname, d.menuno, m.menuName, m.categoryNo, c.categoryname from menu m, category c, defaultmenu d, setunit u where u.storeno = #{storeNo} and u.unitno = d.unitno and m.menuno = d.menuno and m.categoryno = c.categoryno order by u.unitno desc

select u.unitno, u.unitname, d.menuno, m.menuName, m.categoryNo, c.categoryname from menu m, category c, defaultmenu d, setunit u where u.unitno = #{unitNo} and u.unitno = d.unitno and m.menuno = d.menuno and m.categoryno = c.categoryno
